WorkItem.Description:
Create a means to insert/delete a column or row, updating all references in formulas.
 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
InsertRowBefore(2) --> copy styles from row 1
InsertColumnBefore(C) --> copy styles from column C
 
If the inserted column/row is within a cell range (A1:A5 for example), the range in formulas should be extended to include the new cell(s).
 
Make sure to move images too!
